description: The huge chamber is filled with detritus of all kinds, from large complex contraptions to a thick conglomeration of bits and pieces, all of which defy identification.  Chains in a variety of thicknesses hang in a loopy tangle from the ceiling, snarled with an array of ropes and pulleys.  A long workbench covers the far wall, strewn with tools of every description.  The most notable thing about the whole mess is that everything, barring the rope, is made of mithril.
title: [Cavernfast, Mithril Workshop]
